RelatedSentence: DENVER , May 19 , 2014 / PRNewswire / -- The Colorado Cleantech Industries Association has endorsed the Chubb Group of Insurance Companies as a preferred provider of global property and casualty insurance solutions for its members .

A0: The Colorado Cleantech Industries Association has endorsed the Chubb Group of Insurance Companies as a preferred provider of global property and casualty insurance solutions for its members
RelatedSentence: Chubb has demonstrated that it can help our members protect their property and employees anywhere around the world , said Chris Shapard , executive director of the Colorado Cleantech Industries Association .
